page.title: 12QUESTIONNAIRE SURVEY
page.content: To us the most interesting question on our questionnaire was "Is Bar Hill a true village?".Our sample was split, 49% saying"Yes",48% saying"No" and 3% saying"Don't know".Going by the reasons people gave for their answers it was quite plain to us that they did not really know what a village is or how to define one.We also found it difficult to find a definite definition of a village,so we wrote to several local experts asking them for their definitions of the village.In their replies they all told us that they had found the task difficult but in each case gave us a list of amenities that they felt a settlement should have to be called a village. Interestingly each list was different.However from these lists we developed our own definition.
